greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of disconnected regular simple graphs on n vertices with girth exactly 3.
link: Jason Kimberley, Index of sequences counting disconnected k-regular simple graphs with girth exactly g
xref: This sequence is the row sum sequence of the triangle A210703.
Disconnected k-regular simple graphs with girth exactly 3: this sequence (any k), A210703 (triangle); for fixed k: A185033 (k=3), A185043 (k=4), A185053 (k=5), A185063 (k=6).
results.author: _Jason Kimberley_, Apr 02 2012
